title: FreelanceHub
description: Welcome to the Freelance Marketplace Website – a platform that connects freelancers with clients worldwide. This project enables users to post jobs, hire talent, and manage freelance work easily and securely.

details.longDescription: FreelanceHub is a web application where clients can post jobs and freelancers can apply, track their work, and get feedback. It streamlines freelance workflows and helps build trust between users.
details.challenges: Managing user roles (client/freelancer) and implementing secure authentication with Firebase was challenging.
details.improvements: Planning to add real-time chat, Stripe payment integration, and job recommendation system based on user skills.

title: Zero Waste Meals
description: A web-based food donation platform where users can donate extra food, request food, and manage their donations. Built using React, Firebase, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and React Router.
features: Add food with details like name, quantity, pickup time, and location.
View a list of all donated foods.
Update or delete your own donated food items.

details.longDescription: A web-based food donation platform where users can donate extra food, request food, and manage their donations. Built using React, Firebase, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and React Router..
details.challenges: Creating accurate delivery cost logic and ensuring responsive form UI was tricky with complex nested form data.
details.improvements: Future plans include admin dashboard, SMS notification system, and delivery partner integration.

title: Apartment Management System
description: A modern web application for managing apartment-related tasks such as rent collection, agreements, announcements, member management, and more.
features: Agreement Management – Users can request agreements; admins can approve/manage them.
Rent Payment with History – Secure monthly rent payments via Stripe with full history tracking.
Announcement System – Admins post announcements; users can view all active notices.

details.longDescription: The Apartment Management System offers a seamless experience for both admins and residents by focusing on three core features. Users can conveniently request and manage rental agreements, pay monthly rent securely via Stripe with complete payment history access, and stay informed through a centralized announcement system where admins can publish important updates. These features together ensure a smooth, transparent, and efficient apartment living experience.
details.challenges: Handling real-time updates (like rent status or new announcements) without refreshing the page.
details.improvements: Implement WebSocket or Firebase Realtime Database to enable live updates for better user experience.
